24h Time Stamp issue fixed
Added swipe to back gesture
Minor bug fixes

If you have any questions or concerns regarding the app please contact our support!

• Added STEPS Apple Watch Complication
• Added Today's Widget
• Minor fixes

• Added STEPS Apple Watch Complication
• Added Today's Widget
• Minor fixes

iOS app improvements:
• Added ability to customize different data sets for Today's View widget.
• Fixed issue of repeating graph animation.
• Performance improvements.
• Added new localizations: Spanish, German, French, Italian, Portuguese, Japanese, Korean, Chinese Traditional, Chinese Simplified.

Apple Watch app improvements:
• Added ability to customize Apple Watch Complications.
• Improved speed of Apple Watch app.
• Fixed Apple Watch not refreshing goal and unit settings.

We want to thank you for the continuous support and feedback to our apps. Please write a review on the App Store and if you have any problems please contact our support via the app. Thank you!!

Added 17 new data sets (carbohydrates, fiber, protein, sodium, total fat, dietary sugar, saturated fat, monounsaturated fat, polyunsaturated fat, calcium, iron, potassium, vitamin c, dietary cholesterol, forced expiratory volume, peak expiratory flow rate, pulse oximetry)
Added averages to week, month and year views
Added ability to change app icon (iOS 10.3 users only)
Added ability to show steps on the icon badge (beta)

Thank you for using our app and your kind feedback. If you have any problems with the app or would like to request a feature, please feel free to reach out to our support!

version_description:
Minor bug fixes.

If you are experiencing any issues with the app or would like to send a suggestion, feel free to reach our support from inside the app. Thank you for using HealthView!!

Thank you for your feedback and suggestions! Today we bring you couple new features along with small bug fixes and new data sets. Hope you like it and if you have any questions or concerns, don't hesitate to contact us!

• Added ability to change week start day
• Fixed year issue showing wrong date for selected year
• Fixed stand hours showing wrong values for some users
• Added pink app icon option
• New data sets: pushes, vitamin D, vitamin B12, resting heart rate, heart rate variability, walking heart rate, waist size, VO2max, sexual activity, ovulation test results

Thank you for your feedback and suggestions! Today we bring you couple new features along with small bug fixes and new data sets. Hope you like it and if you have any questions or concerns, don't hesitate to contact us!

• Added ability to change week start day
• Fixed year issue showing wrong date for selected year
• Fixed stand hours showing wrong values for some users
• Added pink app icon option
• New data sets: pushes, vitamin D, vitamin B12, resting heart rate, heart rate variability, walking heart rate, waist size, VO2max, sexual activity, ovulation test results

• Fixed issue of Restore Purchases not working for Paid users.

Today we bring you some big improvements to the Apple Watch app listed below! Hope you like it and if you have any feedback, please do let us know!

• Added support for Apple Watch Series 4 complications
• New Heart Rate complication
• Faster complication refresh
• New Complications Settings page

Thanks for using HealthView! If you have any feedback or comments regarding our improvements, or just wanted to say hello, feel free to contact our support from the app. Thanks!

Thank you for using HealthView! Today's update brings some bug fixes and improvemtns. Thanks for your feedback!
• Fixed Today Widget issue showing unable to load message
• Fixed issue of adding wrong data for blood pressure
• Pure dark mode for iPhone Xs and iPhone Xs Max
• Waist size - it will show most recent data
• Apple Watch complication was showing rounded weight value, now it will show properly
• Fixed issue related with calories showing 9 bars instead of 8 bars
• Fixed Weight graph issue of showing wrong weight for past days
• Fixed issue related with line graphs showing current value instead of 0
• Other minor improvements

If you have any questions or suggestions, please let us know! We are happy to hear your thoughts and suggestions on how we can improve our app and make it even better!

In today's update we bring you exciting new features!!

WIDGETS
• Small/Medium/Large sizes available
• See your health stats at a glance
• Activity style widget, see all Activity data in one widget
• Dark/Light themes

APPLE WATCH
• Added support to show multiple complications on one watch face

EXPORT TO CSV
• Added ability to export your data to a csv file

If you have any questions, feel free to Contact Support from the app.
